data.name: NB Minimus 40 Trainer
data.description: Run and train your way in the multi-tasking New Balance Minimus 40 cross trainer.

data.name: NIKE PRESTO FLY
data.description: A remake of the 2000 original, the Nike Presto Fly Men's Shoe delivers a T-shirt-like feel for your foot, with a breathable, incredibly flexible upper.
